forms.title: Service Request Form
forms._form:
[section_break section_break-26 "Service Request"] Please fill out the form and press "Submit" at the bottom of the form. We will receive you request, process it and answer you within 24 hours regarding to following activities. [/section_break] [section_break section_break-267 "Property Details"] [address address-118 format:international required_fields:line1|city|state|zip|country] [section_break section_break-737 "Contact Person Details"] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [eacf7-row] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [eacf7-col col:2] [/eacf7-col] [/eacf7-row] [section_break section_break-99 "Service Requirements"] [section_break section_break-832 "Availability"]
[submit "Submit"]

_mail.subject: [_site_title] "[your-subject]"
_mail.body:
From: [your-name] [your-email]
Subject: [your-subject]

Message Body:
[your-message]

-- 
This is a notification that a contact form was submitted on your website ([_site_title] [_site_url]).

_mail_2.subject: [_site_title] "[your-subject]"
_mail_2.body:
Message Body:
[your-message]

-- 
This email is a receipt for your contact form submission on our website ([_site_title] [_site_url]) in which your email address was used. If that was not you, please ignore this message.

_messages.mail_sent_ok: Thank you for your message. It has been sent.
_messages.mail_sent_ng: There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later.
_messages.validation_error: One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again.
_messages.spam: There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later.
_messages.accept_terms: You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message.
_messages.invalid_too_long: This field has a too long input.
_messages.invalid_too_short: This field has a too short input.
_messages.upload_failed: There was an unknown error uploading the file.
_messages.upload_file_type_invalid: You are not allowed to upload files of this type.
_messages.upload_file_too_large: The uploaded file is too large.
_messages.upload_failed_php_error: There was an error uploading the file.
_messages.invalid_date: Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
_messages.date_too_early: This field has a too early date.
_messages.date_too_late: This field has a too late date.
_messages.number_too_small: This field has a too small number.
_messages.number_too_large: This field has a too large number.
_messages.quiz_answer_not_correct: The answer to the quiz is incorrect.
_messages.invalid_captcha: Could not verify the reCaptcha response.
